def get_recom(title,sig=sig):
    idcs=idx[title]
    sim_sc=list(enumerate(sig[idcs]))
    sim_sc=sorted(sim_sc,key=lambda x: x[1],reverse=True)
    sim_sc=sim_sc[1:21]
    book_indices=[i[0] for i in sim_sc]
    wss=[]
    for i in book_indices:
        wss.append(black['book_title'].iloc[i])
        
    return wss
